verbs.description: If [ARG0: Robert Mueller] [V: seeks] [ARG1: to question President Trump] , could the White House successfully refuse to make him available ?
If [ARG0: Robert Mueller] seeks to [V: question] [ARG1: President Trump] , could the White House successfully refuse to make him available ?
If Robert Mueller seeks to question President Trump , [V: could] the White House successfully refuse to make him available ?
[ARGM-ADV: If Robert Mueller seeks to question President Trump] , [ARGM-MOD: could] [ARG0: the White House] [ARGM-MNR: successfully] [V: refuse] [ARG1: to make him available] ?
If Robert Mueller seeks to question President Trump , could [ARG0: the White House] successfully refuse to [V: make] [ARG1: him available] ?
